summary: The module parses Open Library data dumps (editions, works, authors, redirects) and converts each record into (key, property, value) triples that can later be merged for Solr indexing. It provides a Writer class for output handling and a collection of helper functions for extracting fields, fixing data, handling subjects, and generating intermediate dump files.
business_intent: Transform raw Open Library records into a structured triple format suitable for ingestion by a Solr search engine, enabling efficient indexing and search of books, authors, and related metadata.
